verses.text_plain: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
verses.verse_html:
1He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty. ▼
▼ abide: Heb. lodge

verses.text_plain: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
verses.verse_html: 2I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

verses.text_plain: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
verses.verse_html: 3Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.

verses.text_plain: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
verses.verse_html: 4He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;
verses.verse_html: 5Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;

verses.text_plain: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
verses.verse_html: 6Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.

verses.text_plain: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
verses.verse_html: 7A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.

verses.text_plain: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
verses.verse_html: 8Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

verses.text_plain: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;
verses.verse_html: 9Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;

verses.text_plain: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
verses.verse_html: 10There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

verses.text_plain: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
verses.verse_html: 11For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

tokens.text: For he shall give his angels

verses.text_plain: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
verses.verse_html: 12They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
verses.verse_html:
13Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet. ▼
▼ adder: or, asp

verses.text_plain: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
verses.verse_html: 14Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

tokens.text: Because he hath set his love
upon me, therefore will I deliver
him: I will set him on high

verses.text_plain: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
verses.verse_html: 15He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

tokens.text: upon me, and I will answer

verses.text_plain: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
verses.verse_html:
16With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation. ▼
▼ long…: Heb. length of days

footnotes.body_html: ▼ long…: Heb. length of days
